Author: CrisF#3405
Content:
Hi, are these the correct chain params for the new RICK and MORTY (just name changes)?
```-ac_name=MORTY -ac_supply=90000000000 -ac_reward=100000000 -ac_cc=3 -ac_staked=10 -addnode=95.217.44.58 -addnode=138.201.136.145```

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content:
```./komodod -pubkey=$pubkey -ac_name=RICK -ac_supply=90000000000 -ac_reward=100000000 -ac_cc=3 -ac_staked=10 -addnode=95.217.44.58 -addnode=138.201.136.145 &
./komodod -pubkey=$pubkey -ac_name=MORTY -ac_supply=90000000000 -ac_reward=100000000 -ac_cc=3 -ac_staked=10 -addnode=95.217.44.58 -addnode=138.201.136.145 &```
https://github.com/jl777/komodo/blob/dev/src/assetchains.old

Author: CrisF#3405
Content: Thanks man!  `assetchains.old`  was looking :abusedsmily:

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: I believe I must have spent the most money in second season of Notary Nodes, just by choosing to stick with AWS longer enough think our nodes will get best outputs, which is not true.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: I was wondering about my expenses for just server hosting etc for past year which were only did for Notary Nodes, and it all totals to about 40,000+ NZD

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content:
```Hostings    Period From    Period To    Total
AWS+OVH+DO    Jan 2018    Aug 2019    $33,595.77
Hetzner    Jan 2018    Aug 2019    $7,396.98
        SUM    $40,992.75```

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: That's for 2 nodes on AWS mostly

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: DO is Digital Ocean while doing some quick testing of automation scripts etc.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: the hardest part for last season for me was to not to change the hosting provider just because single reason.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: IP Address

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: changing that has to dealt with a lot of pain while the whole network propagates to use new IP

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: In my opinion, for ANY current and future Notary Nodes, I'd highly recommend to host your OWN HARDWARE in a local Co-location

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: For BEST outcomes to my opinion.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: because that's exactly what I did in my firs season of Notary Nodes

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: my monthly expenses were 4th of what it was in second season

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: running own hardware node, locally in NZ, colocated, with a shity internet speed of almost 10 Mbps or sometimes even lower, and my node still did well in season 1

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: CC @ns408

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: internet speed and ping time has very very little to do with the Notary Node's performance. to my opinion, don't fall for that thinking having fastest servers will do any more good than bit slowest servers.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: my current situation being done that is I'm out of savings and now cashing out my crypto savings for monthly expenses.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: if any of you are using AWS for your Notary Nodes, I'd suggest you to have enough good amount of savings in fiat money already, coz that will save you not cashing out your crypto.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: which can help making better protfolio.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: I should add that the amount shown is just the billed amount to my bank account. I also paid huge tax for depositing this money to my bank account.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: if I estimate that too, that might be close to 30%-35% of tax of my total year's deposited money to bank account.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: it kinda wipped all my cash out I did for future savings from last crypto bull market

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: I think I chose good not to stand for 3rd season notary nodes.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: I still hope to get some profit out of the earned KMD. coz not a single KMD is sold yet from the whole season 2 mined KMD.
